title: [MNT] Consider github scheduled reminders for PRs

labels.name: maintenance
labels.description: Continuous integration, unit testing & package distribution

body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

We could try to reduce the time it takes to review PRs by subscribing to scheduled reminders from github that would periodically remind core developers about outstanding reviews. More information here https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/setting-up-and-managing-your-github-user-account/managing-your-membership-in-organizations/managing-your-scheduled-reminders

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Scheduled notifications from github into a slack channel reminding about outstanding PR reviews.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**

This features requires organization level access on github so it is currently blocked.
